name: Dimension Core
description: This module enhances chain lightning mechanics by improving targeting, doubling shock effects, and allowing shock multipliers to stack on the same enemy.

context_fields.when_to_use: When using chain lightning ultimate weapon and need enhanced shock effects
context_fields.upgrade_priority: Focus on higher rarity versions for more stack capacity
synergy_combinations: Attack speed for more shock applications
counter_strategies: Most effective with chain lightning active
context_fields.resource_efficiency: Very High - significant enhancement for chain lightning builds

notes: Base shock mult with lab maxed is 1.66x (1 + 0.66)
Base shock mult after doubled by dim core effect 2.32x (1 + 1.32)
Shock mult stacking is additive and of the form: 1 + 1.32*n so for 20 stacks this would be 1 + 1.32*20 = 27.4x total mult once fully stacked
unique_effect: Chain lightning have 60% chance of hitting the initial target. Shock chance and multiplier is doubled. If shock is applied again to the same enemy the shock multiplier will add up to a max stack of [x]
